user_request: I want to cancel the alarm set for 7:30 tomorrow morning that repeats every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, and then set a new one-time alarm for 8:00 in the morning.

Step 2: Based on the flight status, if the flight is delayed, send a short message to Mrs. Wang to inform her about the delayed flight.
Step 3: Order a special vehicle rental service to pick up Mrs. Wang at the airport.
Step 4: Call the hotel booking query to book a hotel for Mrs. Wang.
Step 5: Confirm the flight status and inform Mrs. Wang of the latest status.

task_steps: Step 1: Call flight_status_tracker to query the current status of flight number CA1234. The system returns "flight CA1234 is delayed by 30 minutes."
Step 2: Call send_sms to send a text message to the number 13812345678 with the content "Flight CA1234 is delayed by 30 minutes."
Step 3: Call clock_alarm_set to set an alarm for 20 minutes from now and remind to re-query the flight status.
